title: Seduction
description: Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B006WC00N2.Welcome to the Plume – where members are bound by desireand fantasies come true…Joanna and Mike have discovered that they share a taste for bondage as well as a yearning for a committed relationship. Can they build a future together that fulfills their secret desires - or will the allure of the Plume and its pleasures prove too potent to resist?Meanwhile, it’s Christmas at the Plume and Rex is making the wishes of club members come true - including those who have been nice and those who have been naughty.This novella is the third of nine in the Plume Series. Each novella is available individually. There are also anthologies available which include three novellas each.
author: Ella Ardent
